name: Jiaying Chen
testimonial: Susan sees potential in people and she knows exactly how to help you to achieve your goals. She not only guided me when I was in law school but also on my legal journey after school. Thank you, Susan!

name: Juliana Lobo
testimonial: Susan's deep understanding of the legal system and personalized guidance helped me navigate the bar exam with confidence. I'm grateful for her mentorship, which not only helped me pass the exam but also prepared me for my legal career ahead.
